items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Pizza topped with pepperoni, tomato sauce, and mozzarella.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Pasta with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan, served with garlic bread.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Layers of pasta with meat, tomato sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Crispy wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy fried potatoes seasoned with salt.

items.name: Espresso
items.description: Strong and rich coffee served as a shot.
